establishment.address: Shop E-2, Madhav Residency, Near Shriji Arcade, Anand Mahal Road, Adajan Gam, Surat
establishment.res_chain_text: See all 2 Thepla Junction outlets in Surat

items.name: Multigrain Combo 2
items.description: Multigrain Oil Thepla+Sukhi Bhaji+Masala Chai/ Curd/Butter Milk

items.name: Regular Vegetable Combo 1
items.description: Veg Oil Thepla +Sukhi Bhaji+Masala Chai/Curd/ Butter Milk

items.name: Special Vegetable Combo 3
items.description: Spl.Veg Oil Thepla + Suki Bhaji + Spl. Dahi Chatni/Spl. Chai

items.name: Vegetable Dessert Combo 4
items.description: Veg Oil Thepla + Suki Bhaji + Carrot/Dudhi Halwa/Kheer

items.name: Beetroot Thepla
items.description: Beetroot Vegetable Thepla Is A Delicious And Healthy Flatbase That Is Served At Thepla Junction. Made From A Combination Of Wheat Flour, Grated Beetroot, And A Blend Of Spices And Herbs, This Dish Is A Perfect Choice For Health-Conscious Diners.

items.name: Carrot Thepla
items.description: Made From A Blend Of Wheat Flour, Grated Carrots, And A Variety Of Spices And Herbs, This Dish Is A Perfect Combination Of Health And Taste. The Thepla Is Made Fresh On-Site And Served Hot Off The Griddle.

items.name: Crunchy Thepla
items.description: The Crunchy Thepla Is Best Enjoyed With A Variety Of Chutneys And Pickles, Which Are Served Alongside It To Enhance The Flavor. It Is A Great Option For Those Looking For A Tasty And Healthy Snack, Or As An Accompaniment To Any Meal At Thepla Junction.

items.name: Dudhi Thepla
items.description: Dudhi Vegetable Thepla Is A Delicious Indian Flatbase That Is Made With Bottle Gourd (Also Known As Dudhi Or Lauki), Wheat Flour, And A Blend Of Spices. At Thepla Junction, We Prepare Our Dudhi Vegetable Thepla With Freshly Grated Bottle Gourd, Which Is Mixed With Whole Wheat Flour, Grated Onions, And A Variety Of Spices Such As Cumin, Coriander Powder, And Turmeric.

items.name: Garlic Thepla
items.description:
Made From A Blend Of Wheat Flour, Finely Minced Garlic, And A Variety Of Spices And Herbs, This Dish Is A Must-Try For Garlic Lovers,It Has A Soft And Chewy Texture With A Slightly Crispy Exterior, Making It A Perfect
Accompaniment To Any Meal.

items.name: Methi Thepla
items.description: The Methi Vegetable Thepla Served At Thepla Junction Is A Delectable And Healthy Indian Flatbase That Can Be Savored At Any Time Of The Day. It'S Prepared Using A Blend Of Whole Wheat Flour, Fresh Fenugreek (Methi) Leaves, And An Assortment Of Vegetables, Resulting In A Dish That'S Both Flavorful And Nutritious

items.name: Onion Thepla
items.description: Made From A Mixture Of Wheat Flour, Finely Chopped Onions, And A Blend Of Aromatic Spices And Herbs, This Dish Is A Must-Try For Onion Lovers. The Thepla Is Freshly Made On-Site And Served Hot Off The Griddle.

items.name: Palak Thepla
items.description: Our Palak Vegetable Thepla Is A Great Option For Those Who Want To Enjoy A Nutritious And Flavorful Meal That Is Also Vegetarian Friendly. It Is Perfect To Enjoy With A Side Of Our Homemade Chutneys And A Cup Of Hot Chai.

items.name: Pudina Thepla
items.description: Pudina Vegetable Thepla Is A Refreshing And Flavorful Flatbase That Is Served At Thepla Junction. Made From A Blend Of Wheat Flour, Fresh Mint Leaves, And A Variety Of Vegetables And Spices, This Dish Is A Perfect Choice For Those Who Love A Burst Of Flavor In Every Bite.

items.name: Special Hara Bhara
items.description: Made From A Blend Of Wheat Flour, Fresh Spinach, And A Variety Of Vegetables And Spices, This Dish Is A Great Choice For Vegetarians And Those Who Love A Healthy And Nutritious Meal, It Is A Great Option For Those Looking For A Tasty And Healthy Meal, Or As A Snack Or Side Dish To Accompany Any Meal At Thepla Junction.

items.name: Special Hot Chilli
items.description: Made From A Mixture Of Wheat Flour, Fresh Green Chillies, And A Variety Of Spices And Herbs, This Dish Is A Must-Try For Those Who Love Bold And Spicy Flavors. The Fresh Green Chillies Add A Fiery Kick To The Thepla, Which Is Perfectly Balanced By The Blend Of Spices And Herbs Used In The Recipe.

items.name: Bajri Thepla
items.description:
Made From A Blend Of Bajra Flour, Wheat Flour, And Other Nutritious Flours, This Dish Is A Great Source Of Dietary Fiber, Vitamins, And Minerals,The Multigrain Thepla Is Packed With The Goodness Of Whole Grains, Which Makes
It A Perfect Choice For Those Who Are Health-Conscious And Looking For A
Wholesome Meal

items.name: Jau Juwar Thepla
items.description: Jau Juwar Multigrain Thepla Is A Wholesome And Nutritious Flatbase That Is Served At Thepla Junction. Made From A Blend Of Wheat Flour, Barley Flour, And Sorghum Flour, This Dish Is A Great Source Of Dietary Fiber And Essential Nutrients.

items.name: Makai Thepla
items.description: Made From A Blend Of Maize Flour And Wheat Flour & Corn, This Dish Has A Distinctive Texture And Flavor That Is Sure To Delight Your Taste Buds. It Has A Soft And Slightly Crumbly Texture With A Sweet And Nutty Flavor, Which Comes From The Combination Of Maize And Wheat Flours Used In The Recipe.

items.name: Math Thepla
items.description: Made From A Blend Of Moth Bean Flour, Wheat Flour, And Aromatic Spices, This Dish Has A Unique And Nutty Flavor With A Slightly Crunchy Texture. The Moth Beans Add A Significant Amount Of Protein And Dietary Fiber To The Thepla, Making It A Great Option For Those Looking For A Healthy And Satisfying Meal.

items.name: Multigrain Platter
items.description: Multigrain Platter Thepla Is A Healthy And Nutritious Indian Flatbase Made From A Blend Of Different Flours Such As Wheat, Millet, Jowar (Sorghum), And Besan (Gram Flour). It Is A High-Fiber Option That Is Rich In Essential Vitamins And Minerals.

items.name: Raagi Thepla
items.description: Raagi Thepla Is A Nutritious Indian Flatbase Made From Ragi (Finger Millet) Flour. The Dough Is Typically Prepared With Grated Vegetables Such As Carrots Or Bottle Gourd, Chopped Green Chilies, Ginger Paste, And Spices Like Cumin And Coriander Powder.

items.name: Rajgira Thepla
items.description: Rajgira Thepla Is A Popular And Nutritious Indian Flatbase Made From Rajgira (Amaranth) Flour. The Dough Is Typically Prepared With Grated Boiled Potatoes, Chopped Green Chilies, Ginger Paste, And Spices Like Cumin And Coriander Powder.

items.name: Soyabean Thepla
items.description: Soyabean Multigrain Thepla Is A Delicious And Nutritious Flatbase That Is Served At Thepla Junction. Made From A Blend Of Soybean Flour, Wheat Flour, And Other Nutritious Flours, This Dish Is A Great Source Of Plant-Based Protein, Dietary Fiber, Vitamins, And Minerals.

items.name: Cheese Corn Thepla
items.description: Cheese Corn Thepla Is A Delicious Variation Of Traditional Indian Flatbase, Made By Adding Grated Cheese And Sweet Corn To The Thepla Dough.

items.name: Cheese Paneer Thepla
items.description: Cheese Paneer Thepla Is A Delicious Variation Of The Traditional Indian Flatbase, Made By Adding Grated Paneer (Indian Cottage Cheese) And Cheese To The Thepla Dough. Cheese Paneer Thepla Is Perfect For Those Who Love The Combination Of Cheese And Paneer And Can Be Enjoyed As A Snack Or Meal.

items.name: Cheese-Jamthepla
items.description: Cheese Jam Thepla Is A Delicious Fusion Of Indian Flatbase And Western Flavors. It Is Made By Adding Grated Cheese And A Layer Of Fruit Jam To The Traditional Thepla Dough.

items.name: Chinese Thepla
items.description: Chinese Thepla Is A Fusion Dish That Combines The Flavors Of Chinese Cuisine With The Indian Flatbase, Thepla. Chinese Thepla Can Be Enjoyed With A Variety Of Chinese-Inspired Dishes, Such As Stir-Fried Vegetables, Sweet And Sour Sauce, Or Noodles.

items.name: Double Cheese Butter Thepla
items.description: Double Cheese Butter Thepla Is A Mouthwatering Variation Of The Traditional Indian Flatbase, Made By Adding Two Types Of Cheese And Butter To The Thepla Dough. The Dough Is Prepared With Wheat Flour, Spices Such As Cumin, Coriander, And Turmeric, Grated Cheddar Cheese, And Mozzarella Cheese.

items.name: Jam-Butterthepla
items.description: Jam Butter Thepla Is A Delicious And Unique Variation Of The Traditional Indian Flatbase. It Is Made By Spreading A Layer Of Fruit Jam And Butter On Top Of Thepla

items.name: Mexican Thepla
items.description: Mexican Thepla Is A Fusion Of Indian And Mexican Cuisines, Combining The Flavors Of Indian Flatbase With Traditional Mexican Ingredients. The Thepla Dough Is Prepared With Wheat Flour, Cornmeal, And Spices Such As Cumin, Chili Powder, And Paprika.

items.name: Premium Platter
items.description: The Dough For Premium Platter Thepla Is Prepared With A Combination Of Wheat Flour, Millet Flour, And Other Grains Such As Quinoa Or Amaranth, Along With Various Spices Such As Cumin, Coriander, And Turmeric. It Can Be Enjoyed As A Snack Or As A Side Dish With A Variety Of Indian Chutneys.

items.name: Schezwan Thepla
items.description: Schezwan Thepla Is A Spicy And Flavorful Indian Flatbase That Is Inspired By The Popular Chinese Condiment, Schezwan Sauce. It Is Made By Adding Schezwan Sauce To The Traditional Thepla Dough, Along With Other Spices Such As Cumin, Coriander, And Turmeric.

items.name: Stuffed Thepla
items.description: Stuffed Thepla Is A Delicious Variation Of The Traditional Indian Flatbase, Where The Dough Is Filled With A Variety Of Savory Or Sweet Fillings. Stuffed Thepla Is Perfect For Those Who Want A More Filling And Flavorful Version Of The Traditional Flatbase And Can Be Enjoyed As A Snack Or Meal.

items.name: Curd
items.description: Curd, also known as yogurt, is commonly eaten with Theplas, with people often dipping their pieces of Thepla into the curd. It serves as a popular and wholesome accompaniment, adding a creamy and refreshing element to the meal.

items.name: Dahi Chatni
items.description: Dahi chutney is a yogurt-based condiment made by blending it with herbs like cumin and coriander to create a flavorful sauce. It adds a tangy and creamy touch to Theplas.

items.name: Special Dahi Chatni
items.description: Special dahi chutney often carries a heightened burst of flavors, combining tangy, cooling, and spicy notes in a perfect amalgamation. Special dahi chutney serves as a versatile accompaniment to various snacks, appetizers, and main dishes, adding an extra layer of zest and freshness to the overall culinary experience.

items.name: Tj Special Chatni
items.description: Special dahi chutney is a unique variant of the classic Indian yogurt-based condiment. It is prepared by blending yogurt with a special selection of aromatic herbs and spices such as mint, coriander, cumin, and green chilies.

items.name: Dudhi Halwa
items.description: Dudhi Halwa, also known as Lauki ka Halwa, is a delightful Indian dessert renowned for its delicate sweetness and smooth, pudding-like texture. The dish is made by grating bottle gourd and combining it with ghee, milk, and sugar. Its texture is such that it melts in one's mouth upon consumption.

items.name: Gajar Halwa
items.description: Gajar ka Halwa, also known as Carrot Halwa, is an aromatic Indian dessert prepared by grating fresh carrots and gently baking them with ghee, milk, and sugar. This sweet dish is a preferred delicacy served during auspicious occasions, symbolizing the rich culinary heritage of India.

items.name: Black Lemon Chai
items.description: Black Lemon Tea invigorating beverage prepared by squeezing lemon and adding black tea leaves in a glass of water. The beverage offers a refreshing experience that not only awakens the senses but also provides soothing comfort, making it a cherished choice for tea lovers.

items.name: Cold Bournvita
items.description: Cold Bournvita is made by blending the well-loved brand among children - Bournvita, with sugar and a glass of milk. The drink ushers in a wave of energy upon consumption.

items.name: Cold Coffee
items.description: Cold coffee is one of the most loved beverages across the world. It is a refreshing drink made by blending freshly brewed coffee with chilled milk and sugar. Cold Coffee offers a delightful balance of robust coffee flavor and velvety smoothness.

items.name: Cold Masala Milk
items.description: Cold masala milk is made by blending milk with spices like saffron and cardamom. The drink offers a delightful balance of creamy texture and a medley of warm, fragrant flavors.

items.name: Nimbu Paani
items.description: Nimbu Paani (lemonade) is curated by squeezing lemon with a touch of sugar and salt into water. It is a quintessential drink that not only quenches thirst but also boosts the energy of the person drinking it. People prefer to have it during hot summer afternoons

items.name: Tandoori Paneer Thepla
items.description: Tandoori Paneer is a mouthwatering dish curated by marinating cubes of cottage cheese (paneer) with a blend of spices like cumin, coriander, and red chili powder. The dish is traditionally cooked in a clay oven that imparts a distinct aroma to it.
